pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 27, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, July 27, 2017:

Alma, Quebec

9:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with business leaders, union representatives and local elected officials.

City Hall meeting room
Alma City Hall
140, rue St. Joseph Sud

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the roundtable
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
